narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This inspection was conducted with the Attending Veterinarian, two Clinical Veterinarians, Vivarium Manager, and the 
Director of Animal Care and Use Program. The exit interview was conducted with the Attending Veterinarian, the IACUC 
chair, the Director of Animal Care and Use Program, and Associate Vice President.
